>
[Warden's Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=1776) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 133 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
warden spells

</column>

---

Your connection with your surroundings grows deeper as you focus. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you [Refocused](/Actions.aspx?ID=71), you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

<title level="2">Warden's Focus leads to...</title>
[Warden's Wellspring](/Feats.aspx?ID=1777)
